entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:50 a.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 1:14 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 1:14 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:14 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
